Pre-Game Insights: Morocco and Tanzania will face each other in their Group F match of the 2023 AFCON at the Laurent Pokou Stadium on January 17, 2024, at 19h00 CAT.
Morocco leads 4-1 in their head-to-head encounters, with their last meeting resulting in a 2-0 victory for Morocco in a 2026 World Cup qualifier on November 21, 2023.
Morocco's key player, Hakim Ziyech, has struggled with injuries in 2023 but scored in their last meeting against Tanzania.
Tanzania's key striker, Mbwana Samatta, is aiming to get back on the scoresheet after a goal drought in his last 11 appearances.
Others: This will be the first meeting of Morocco and Tanzania at the AFCON, although they have faced each other in qualifying matches before.
